content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Station at position(0,0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions(0,0) and (2,0) for smelting iron plates
- Burner inserter at position(0.5,-1.5) feeding iron ore into first furnace
- Burner inserter at position(2.5,-1.5) feeding iron ore into second furnace
Both furnaces have coal fuel but are currently idle with no ingredients.

### Automated Coal Mining Station at position(41,-82)
An automated coal mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at position(41,-82) mining coal
- Wooden chest at position(41.5,-80.5) collecting mined coal (currently contains 74 coal)
- Burner inserter at position(41.5,-79.5) oriented upward
The system is operational with the drill actively mining coal.

### Iron Ore Mining Station at position(-18,-53)
An automated iron ore mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18,-53) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at position(-17.5,-51.5) collecting mined iron ore
- Burner inserter at position(-16.5,-51.5) oriented right to feed ore onto transport belts
The system is operational with the drill actively mining iron ore.

### Transport Belt Network
A complex belt network connecting the iron ore mining to the smelting area with multiple parallel lines:
- Mining area connection (-15.5,-51.5) to (-13.5,-52.5)
- Main transport line from (-17.5,-51.5) to (-13.5,-44.5)
- Middle section (-9.5,-49.5) to (-7.5,-44.5)
- Final approach section (-6.5,-46.5) to (-5.5,-42.5)
- End delivery section (0.5,-8.5) to (2.5,-2.5)
Currently transporting small amounts of iron ore through some sections.

ERROR TIPS

### Belt Placement and Connection Issues
- Remove existing belts before attempting to place new ones at the same position
- Ensure you have transport belts in inventory before attempting to create connections
- When rebuilding belt networks, clear problematic sections completely before reconstruction
- Verify belt orientations match the intended flow direction

### Resource Extraction Issues
- Move to the correct position before attempting to extract items
- Verify the target entity exists and contains the desired resource
- Check container inventories before attempting extraction

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones
- Remove blocking entities before placing new structures
- Verify space is available for new entity placement

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in mining drills and inserters
- Maintain adequate fuel distribution to all machines
- Keep track of iron ore production and transport

### Inventory Management
- Ensure required items are in inventory before construction
- Maintain sufficient materials for planned belt connections
- Keep track of available resources for crafting needs

### System Configuration
- Verify correct orientation of inserters relative to belts and chests
- Monitor automated system status regularly
- Ensure proper connections between system components
